author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Add an extra template parameter to allow usage of a different DDCompactView in the template specialization 

Note: Migration away from using CLHEP is not part of this PR.

#### PR validation:

usual RelVal tests

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:

- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: Calo Geometry Loader: DD dependency cleanup
